t: Good alternative to "Hint" brand water
s: I bought three flavors of this product: grapefruit, lime, and orange. Used just by itself, it is a good alternative to Hint brand water. Just have your own water bottle or jug, add 1 or 2 envelopes depending on your taste. I add a couple of Stevia packets to make it sweeter.

t: Check out this Amazon review of Band-Aid Brand of First Aid Products Waterproof Tape, 1 Inch by 10 Yards (Pack of 6)
